name: worker-management-system
description: Production-ready worker management system with customer and agency portals

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && composer install
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:backend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && cp .env.example .env && php artisan key:generate && php artisan migrate --seed
